```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
df_one = read.csv("homicide-data.csv")
head(df_one)
tail(df_one)
str(df_one)
view(df_one)
```
This data set consists of 52179 observations and 12 variables.  Of those variables, all are characters except for "lat" and "lon", which are integers.

```{r}
df_one = janitor::clean_names(df_one)
df_one_mutate = df_one %>% mutate(city_state = paste(city, state))
str(df_one_mutate)
df_one_mutate %>% group_by(city_state, disposition) %>% summarize(n_homicide = n())
```
